plot: Christian is spending more and more weekend nights in his office. His girlfriend Lena has her own understanding of pastime activities. And Kevin, he doesn't seem to fit in at all.
title: Überstunden
plot_es: Christian is spending more and more weekend nights in his office. His girlfriend Lena has her own understanding of pastime activities. And Kevin, he doesn't seem to fit in at all.
plot_en: Christian is spending more and more weekend nights in his office. His girlfriend Lena has her own understanding of pastime activities. And Kevin, he doesn't seem to fit in at all.
